blog.name: tonyndum-e
blog.title: Tony Stark owns my heart
blog.description: NOT A SPOILER-FREE BLOG!!! · writer, programmer, fangirl · Marvel, The 100, OUAT, GoT, B-99, Eurovision, · huge space nerd · [langblr/writeblr: @spacetravelwriter]

tags: pepper and peter after the funeral
summary: A gift
body:
A gift

The flower bundle has disappeared into the horizon. Either the lake got it or it’s just too far away that it disappeared from everyone’s eyesight. Either way, it’s gone now.

Pepper gets back in the house with Morgan and Peter follows. Happy makes sure everyone is settled and comfortable as she doesn’t want the guests to leave yet.

She takes Peter to the kitchen alone leaving Morgan with Rhodey. The two stand in the kitchen for quite some time after which Pepper finally finds the words.

“There- there’s something of yours here. It’s waiting for you,” she puts a hand on his shoulder but is unable to look him in the eyes.

“Mrs Sta- Pepper,” he notices her shaking her head and mumbling Pepper, so he corrects himself, “it’s alright. You don’t have to- ”

“I’m fine, kid. As fine as I can be, trust me on that. I’m the one who should be worried about you here. That’s the one thing I’m required to do now.”

“I don’t get it.”

“Follow me. There’s something he left you.”

“W- what?”

“Come.” she takes Peter’s hand and drags him herself.

She takes him to the basement and after making him stand in the dark for a few moments, she tells Friday to turn everything on.

“Welcome, Peter.” Friday scans him.

Peter twirls around scanning the room around him. It looks very much like one of Tony’s labs. It’s definitely some sort of workspace.

“It’s yours now. I’ll give you the key and you can come anytime you want. You can also move all this to another location but assuming you don’t have another peaceful location, feel free to come here as much as you need,” Pepper explains.

“But- but why?”

“You’re asking the wrong person. This is not my gift, it’s Tony’s. Though you should know, it doesn’t come as a surprise to me. You were constantly on his mind. He waited for the moment he sees you again. No wonder he left you all this. And this is all he’s been doing for the past five years.”

“But… The suits and the gadgets and- ”

“Do whatever you like with them. Leave them, modify them, burn them, wear them. They are yours, kid.”

“How am I supposed to- you know- I wish I could… I hope I can let him know I- ”

“You don’t have to tell me but I’m certain he knows.”

She pulls him into a hug. A very tight hug and doesn’t let him go for good fifteen seconds or so. She feels his little muffled sobs so she pulls him away holding tightly onto his shoulders. “You got this. You got it.”

She climbs up leaving him alone in the small room that has never felt so vast in his life.

“Would you like me to play the footage for you?” Friday says.

“Footage?”

“He left you… instructions. Would you like to play them?”

He finds the nearest chair and stumbles upon it a few times while trying to sit down. “Sure. Play. I guess.”

to be continued…

summary: Endgame robbed us from:
body:
Endgame robbed us from:

-Pepperony wedding

-Tony’s reaction to the pregnancy

-Irondad/Spiderson kiss

-No Rhodey/Tony hug when he comes back to Earth

-Mommy! Pepper

-Uncle! Rhodey

-Big brother! Peter

-Big brother! Harley

-Harley/Peter/Morgan meeting

-No May/Tony conflict/talk about Peter’s death

-Five years of cute/soft Tony being all domestic (aka stay at home dad, aka trophy husband)

-A HAPPILY EVER AFTER FOR TONY’S ARC WITH HIS FAMILY!!

(Add more if you feel like it)

summary: The Corruption of Peter Parker, by Harley Keener
title: The Corruption of Peter Parker, by Harley Keener
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2JGj6K4

by dontstudywritenovels

Harley had meant to intimidate Tony’s intern -that’s the only reason he wore his nice jeans with the stupid maroon shirt that brought out his eyes. He even gelled his hair, for fucksake.

Except, the moment he actually saw Peter Parker, baby blue sweater layered over a button up, jeans ripped where the extra fabric dragged as he walked, he threw that plan out the window.

Or

Harley really wants to fuck Peter so hard that he’s crying for it. He settles for wooing the fuck out of him instead, and maybe making Peter cry when the younger begs him for it.

Tony and Bucky Ulmanis enjoy their tiny, Baltic Sea home with their dog, Apollo. They, really, couldn’t be happier.

They really couldn’t.
